Paek Nam Sun meets foreign guests
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets foreign guests
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun separately met and had talks with new Swedish ambassador to the DPRK Paul Beijer who paid a courtesy call on him and Francesco Frangialli, secretary general of the world tourism organization, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok meets Chinese party delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok meets Chinese party delegation
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the political bureau and secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, today met and had a talk with a delegation of the Dandong city, Liaoning Province, committee of the Communist Party of China headed by its secretary Cai Tiefu.
 At the meeting the head of the delegation said that touring various parts of the DPRK, it had an opportunity to look back with deep emotion on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and witness the successes the Korean people have made in the revolution and construction under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.    
 Watching the mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", the delegation keenly realized that the Korean people are a brave and hard-working people strong in the sense of organization and unity, he noted, adding that it would make positive efforts for the development of the friendly relations between the two peoples.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese party delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese party delegation
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting delegation of the Dandong city Liaoning Province, committee of the Communist Party of China.
 The gift was handed today to Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the political bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, by Cai Tiefu, secretary of the Dandong city committee who is heading the delegation.
